prompt:
A boldly seductive adult Korean woman in her 20s on a yacht deck, ocean horizon, golden
hour.
Pose: standing tall, hips angled; one hand gripping the railing, the other hand adjusting
sunglasses or pushing hair back (controlled dominance).
Expression: unwavering direct gaze, half-lidded eyes, parted lips, no smile.
Swimwear: white one-piece or bandeau bikini (matte), crisp fit, natural fabric tension lines.
Lighting: clean backlight + deck bounce fill, smooth highlight roll-off.
Camera: 85mm f/1.8 handheld candid editorial. Film: Portra 160/400, subtle grain, gentle
vignette.
Exclude text/logos; no nudity; no HDR; no over-sharpening.
